${ModID}:FloatingGear.NAME: Floating Gear
${ModID}:FloatingGear.FLAVOR: They won't miss that one tiny gear.

${ModID}:MarHeart.NAME: Heart of Mar
${ModID}:MarHeart.FLAVOR: An ancient artifact, hidden inside an old statue.

${ModID}:MarSealPiece.NAME: Seal of Mar Piece
${ModID}:MarSealPiece.FLAVOR: You must find all three pieces of the seal to open Mar's gate into the canyon.

${ModID}:PowerCell.NAME: Power Cell
${ModID}:PowerCell.FLAVOR: The most important Precursor artifact you can find.

${ModID}:PrecursorEgg.NAME: Precursor Orbs
${ModID}:PrecursorEgg.FLAVOR: These Precursor orbs are worth some gold here.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click at a shop to sell all orbs for #b5 gold each. NL Find #b1 orb after each fight. NL Every #b10 orbs increases the value by #b1.

${ModID}:ReflectiveLens.NAME: Reflective Lens
${ModID}:ReflectiveLens.FLAVOR: Something's cooking. Hmm, kinda smells like...
DESCRIPTIONS: Reflects the first unblocked damage taken each combat.

${ModID}:MarRubyKey.NAME: Mar's Ruby Key
${ModID}:MarRubyKey.FLAVOR: Used to open a secret door in the Underport.

${ModID}:TimeMap.NAME: Time Map
${ModID}:TimeMap.FLAVOR: An artifact with many coordinates put in.
DESCRIPTIONS: You may ignore paths when choosing the next room to travel to #b2 times. NL Resets to #b2 charges at the start of each act.

${ModID}:VibratingCrystal.NAME: Vibrating Crystal
${ModID}:VibratingCrystal.FLAVOR: This baby will put a smile on your face!
DESCRIPTIONS: The first attack each turn deals additional damage based on the number of attacks played in the previous turn NL Max additional damage is Floor / 2.
